body.p:
Independence Ky
August 28th 1863
His Elxcellency
James F Robinson
Governor of Ky
Sir

John W Swain Indicted for the murder of Peter Finley made his escape from the Covington Jail Some four weeks since -- It was an atrocious murder and he has not been arrested -- I recommend the highest reward allowed by law should be offered by your Excellency for his arrest

Very Respcty
your obt servt
L Shaw P J K C C

Kenton Co
Offer of Reward for John W. Swain (Murder)
$250.
Issd Sept. 2. 1863
